noun.description: A hard, dark, enamel-like varnish containing asphalt, used to give a black gloss to metal objects.

verb.description: Cover (something) with a hard black varnish.
examples: the pillars are to be japanned

proper noun.description: A country in eastern Asia that occupies a chain of islands in the Pacific Ocean roughly parallel with the eastern coast of the Asiatic mainland; population 126,600,000 (estimated 2015); capital, Tokyo; official language, Japanese.
